summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to various posts including SHU (Special Housing Unit) and appears on overtime and sick leave statuses.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Officer listed with assignments, shift changes, and marked on sick/annual leave. Entries show status changes and insertions into posts.

connections.description: Both are correctional officers listed on the same daily assignment roster for MCC New York.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staffing
events.description: Routine daily assignment and shift management for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019.
The roster details post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (Sick/Annual) for correctional officers, including officers Noel, T and Thomas, M.
The document provides operational context for the facility's staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
It includes categories like Special Housing Unit (SHU), control posts, escort duties, and visitor processing areas.
The roster ends with staffing totals: 116 Correctional Services Staff and 7 Non-Correctional Services Staff.
